price: 48. En zij zeggen: “Wanneer zal deze belofte zijn, - als je de waarheid spreekt?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
